channel.title: Local Obituaries from KTIV.com and Tributes.com
channel.description: Obituaries and Online Obituaries News at Tributes.com. Find Local and National Obituaries News and Personal Tributes. Read Obituaries, Death and Funeral Notices, and Create Obituaries for Loved Ones.

item.title: Deborah Kepford, Woodbine, Iowa
item.description:
Deb Kepford, 56, of Woodbine died on Tuesday, March 12th at the Crawford County Hospital in Denison, Iowa. She is survived by her son, Shane Kepford and his wife Teresa of Dunlap, Iowa; mother, Gerry and her husband Don Otte of Woodbine, Iowa; two sisters, Terri Cozad of Woodbine, Iowa, Pam Rathmann of Jacksonville, North Carolina; and many other relatives and friends.
A complete obituary and service times will be posted as soon as the information is available.
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Daniel Jay Dale, 46, Fort Calhoun, Nebraska
item.description: Dale, Daniel Jay March 11, 1966 – March 6, 2013 Age 46, of Fort Calhoun, NE. Survived by daughter, Veronica Dale of Blair, NE, son, Alexander Dale of Fort Calhoun, NE, daughter, Stephenie Dale of Fort Calhoun, NE, brothers, Alan Dale, Terence (Laurel) Dale, Timothy (Rochelle) Dale and Stephen (Marie) Dale, all of Omaha, NE, grandchild, Charlie Dale, many nieces and nephews. VISITATION: 6:00-8:00 pm, Monday, March 11, 2013 at St. John The Baptist Catholic Church, Fort Calhoun, NE. ...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Terry Brasel, Dunlap, Iowa
item.description: Terry Russell Brasel, 61, of Arlington, Texas, formerly of Dow City died on Saturday, March 2nd at the Dunlap Nursing and Rehab Center. Terry was born on June 22, 1951, in Denison, Iowa to parents Robert and Nellie (Baber) Brasel. Terry was raised in the Dow City area and graduated from Dow City High School in 1969. He worked at IBP in Denison for a while and then moved to Arlington, Texas and began a 30 year career with Schwans. He had a home delivery route with Schwans and had received...
item.author: Tributes.com
